pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simple Modelling Tools for Business Plans // A collection of S4 classes, methods and functions to create and visualize business plans. Different types of cash flows can be defined, which can then be used and tabulated to create profit and loss statements, cash flow plans, investment and depreciation schedules, loan amortization schedules, etc. The methods are designed to produce handsome tables in both PDF and HTML using 'RMarkdown' or 'Shiny'.
